title: Windows Subsystem for Linux Distro Gallery Feed

items.title: Ubuntu Linux 18.04
items.content_text: Ubuntu 18.04 on Windows allows one to use Ubuntu Terminal and run Ubuntu command line utilities including bash, ssh, git, apt and many more.

items.title: Ubuntu Linux 16.04
items.content_text: Ubuntu on Windows allows one to use Ubuntu Terminal and run Ubuntu command line utilities including bash, ssh, git, apt and many more.

items.title: Debian Linux
items.content_text: With this distro you get Debian for the Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL). You will be able to use a complete Debian command line environment containing a full current stable release environment.

items.title: Kali Linux
items.content_text: The Kali for Windows application allows one to install and run the Kali Linux open-source penetration testing distribution natively, from the Windows 10 OS.

items.title: OpenSUSE 42
items.content_text: The openSUSE distribution is a stable, easy to use and complete multi-purpose Linux distribution.

items.title: SLES 12
items.content_text: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server is a world-class, secure open source server operating system, built to power physical, virtual and cloud-based mission-critical workloads.
